name: Fold Over
description: Fold a paper sheet along lines to stack colored layers, matching a target pattern in as few folds as possible.
core_loop: You see a flat square 'paper' divided into colored cells and a small target pattern. Drag a fold line across the paper to fold one half onto the other, layering colors. The top-visible color after each fold changes the pattern. Keep folding until your visible surface matches the target. Fewer folds = more stars. Misfolding covers wrong colors, forcing creative recovery folds or a quick undo.
retention_hooks: Star rating (1-3) per puzzle with par-fold targets drives perfectionism and replay
Puzzles start trivially (one fold) and ramp to devious multi-fold problems that feel like aha-moment brainteasers
Daily challenge puzzle with a global leaderboard for fewest folds
controls: Drag across the paper to draw a fold line, then tap/drag the side you want to fold over. Tap undo button to reverse last fold. Fully touch-friendly, no keyboard needed.
